|brand = Broadsoft |model = Micro Appliance |submodelappend = yes |submodel = PI-150 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = PI-03347 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = VoIP gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 01-PI03347G |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;AM3352;AM3352BZCZ60, 7AAXLTW GI, 962B ZCZ; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 600 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = Serial (NOR) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S25FL512SAIFG1; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Alliance Memory;AS4C64M16D2B-25BCN; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6172; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:55:DA
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.01;bacchus_large-7; |stockos = Linux;3.2;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (19200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 8-Kbit Serial I2C EEPROM;STMicro;M24C08;;1;,,, Power Management IC for SoCs;TI;TPS650250;;1;,,, Low-power Dual-Voltage Comparator;STMicro;LM393;;1;,,, 18V 2A Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4524F;;1;,,, 2A 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down Switching Regulator;STMicro;ST1S09;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.100.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = Patton Electronics |manuf_model = PI-03347 |manuf_rev = REV G |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01K3760KS |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "PATTON ELECTRONICS", "MODEL PI-03347", and "03347FA-001 REV G" are silkscreened on board top. :"P/N: 01-PI03347G" is silkscreened on board bottom.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Texas Instruments]] AM3352 :[[ARM]] (Cortex-A8) @600MHz *Storage: 64MB Serial (NOR) Flash *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V/2A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Broadsoft PI-150 Top.jpeg|Board top File:Broadsoft PI-150 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
